title: Best of The Program | Guests: Daniel Presti & James Altucher | 12/8/20
description:
The former head of Israel’s space security program claims a “galactic federation” of aliens doesn’t think mankind is ready to know of its existence. Entrepreneur James Altucher talks the demise of New York and why Bitcoin is in demand. Daniel Presti, co-owner of the coronavirus restriction-defying pub Mac’s Public House, was arrested for allegedly hitting a sheriff’s deputy with his car. But he and his attorney join to tell their side of the story and describe why they’re standing up for small businesses.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
